    • Uses of Group in sage.scene

      Subclasses of Group in sage.scene 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SkyBox
      A SkyBox is a Group made of textured quads that simulates having a sky, horizon and ground around a scene.

    • Uses of Group in sage.terrain

      Subclasses of Group in sage.terrain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TerrainPage
      TerrainPage defines a quad tree of terrain components; each TerrainPage will have four children, either four TerrainPages or four TerrainBlocks.
